entry.title: Australia’s defence exports to Israel sit at 52 in 2023 alone. Senator David Shoebridge asked the defence department in the Senate whether any were approved since the war in Gaza began, but the department could not answer – nor could it confirm how the mi
entry.content: Australia’s defence exports to Israel sit at 52 in 2023 alone. Senator David Shoebridge asked the defence department in the Senate whether any were approved since the war in Gaza began, but the department could not answer – nor could it confirm how the military-specific goods have been used by the Israeli Defence Force. #australia #news #politics #gaza #palestine #palestinian #israel #defence #idf #senate #sentor #government #auspol #todayilearned #learnontiktok #edutok

entry.title: The UN General Assembly has voted overwhelmingly in favour of a humanitarian truce in Gaza, between Israel and Hamas. The resolution is not binding but it applies political pressure – but effectively not from the Australian government, who abstained from
entry.content: The UN General Assembly has voted overwhelmingly in favour of a humanitarian truce in Gaza, between Israel and Hamas. The resolution is not binding but it applies political pressure – but effectively not from the Australian government, who abstained from the vote. #australia #news #gaza #palestine #israel #unitednations #un #ungeneralassembly #vote #government #ambassador #politics #auspol #todayilearned #learnontiktok

entry.title: Six of Australia’s former prime ministers have signed a joint letter condemning antisemitism and religious hatred which it says Hamas has spread in the region and in Australia. The letter was slammed by the Australia Palestine Advocacy Network as “hypocri
entry.content: Six of Australia’s former prime ministers have signed a joint letter condemning antisemitism and religious hatred which it says Hamas has spread in the region and in Australia. The letter was slammed by the Australia Palestine Advocacy Network as “hypocrisy”. #australia #news #gaza #israel #palestine #auspol #politics #primeminister #scottmorrison #tonyabbott #juliagillard #johnhoward #malcolmturnbull #unitednations #palestinian #letter #todayilearned #learnontiktok

entry.title: Many common antibiotics recommended by the World Health Organisation now have less than 50% efficacy in treating infections like sepsis and meningitis. #australia #aunews #todayilearned #health #wellness #edutok #auspol #learnontiktok #science
entry.content: Many common antibiotics recommended by the World Health Organisation now have less than 50% efficacy in treating infections like sepsis and meningitis. #australia #aunews #todayilearned #health #wellness #edutok #auspol #learnontiktok #science

entry.title: For most of the last century, governments in Australia have withheld wages from First Nations people under racial segregation policies. This practice has been described by First Nations people as slavery. #australia #news #firstnations #aboriginal #todayi
entry.content: For most of the last century, governments in Australia have withheld wages from First Nations people under racial segregation policies. This practice has been described by First Nations people as slavery. #australia #news #firstnations #aboriginal #todayilearned #learnontiktok #indigenous #westernaustralia
